alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 3:49AM CDT until June 27 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 348 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of New Mobeetie to 4 miles south of Shamrock to 3 miles south of Quail, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Wellington, Shamrock, Wheeler, Dodson, Lutie, New Mobeetie, Twitty, Dozier, Lela, Quail, Samnorwood and Mobeetie. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
